meanings.sent2: She adjusted the recipe to include less sugar.
meanings.sent3: The robot's dance moves were hilariously adjusted to mimic a human's awkward steps.
meanings.sent4: His perspective on life was adjusted after the near-death experience.
meanings.sent5: The telescope was carefully adjusted to focus on the distant star.
